A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had its moments but overall fell flat on its face\, the force feeding of 1977 type cheesy jokes make it hard to take it remotely seriously. The majority of the important big scenes left you saying to yourself “really that’s what they decided to do here”\, and the bad writing was capped of with bad acting. Again there were a handful of scenes that were awesome to see on the big screen but weren’t enough to hide all of the problems with this movie.
